Package org.apache.pekko.cluster

Class MemberStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pekko.cluster.MemberStatus
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MemberStatus.Down$, MemberStatus.Exiting$, MemberStatus.Joining$, MemberStatus.Leaving$, MemberStatus.PreparingForShutdown$, MemberStatus.ReadyForShutdown$, MemberStatus.Removed$, MemberStatus.Up$, MemberStatus.WeaklyUp$
    public abstract class MemberStatus
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the current status of a cluster member node

    Can be one of: Joining, WeaklyUp, Up, Leaving, Exiting and Down and Removed.
